snippet: Protesters in Bahrain’s capital city clashed with security forces on Saturday, sending tear gas into a major shopping mall and bringing activity on the capital’s streets to a standstill.
abstract: Clash between protesters and security forces in Manama, Bahrain, sends tear gas into shopping mall; Interior Ministry has described attacks as terrorism and urban guerrilla warfare.
lead_paragraph: Protesters in Bahrain’s capital city clashed with security forces on Saturday, sending tear gas into a major shopping mall and bringing activity on the capital’s streets to a standstill.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
